alert.note: Alert for Duval; McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 9:38PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Duval and south central McMullen Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 937 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Seven Sisters to 10 miles south of Freer. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer, Rosita and Seven Sisters. This includes US Highway 59 between mile markers 754 and 774. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
